---
title: "dc_tree_clean"
format: html
editor: visual
---

```{r}

dc_tree <- read_rds("Urban_Forestry_Street_Trees.rds") %>% 
   mutate(
    species_sci = str_extract(SCI_NM, "^[A-Za-z]+\\s+x?\\s?[A-Za-z]+")
  ) %>% 
  group_by(species_sci) %>% 
  summarise(dc_tree = TRUE) %>% 
  write_csv2("dc_tree_species.csv")

```
